meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or excitement.
meanings.sent3: Wowee, I can't believe my eyes!
meanings.sent4: The fireworks lit up the sky, wowee!
meanings.sent5: The magician's trick left the audience saying wowee!

meanings.definition: An exclamation of amazement or admiration.
meanings.sent2: Wowee, you did an amazing job!
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and orange, wowee!
meanings.sent5: The acrobat's performance left the crowd shouting wowee!
